column12: New User for Clearing Firm "551" and Exchange "CBOE" !
New User for Clearing Firm "551" and Exchange "CBOE" !

CFLEX-Entitlements Test Plan (Iteration: Test Case 1:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session can be added at default level using Enablement tab
Test Case 2:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session Invert Enablements functionality
Test Case 3:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session Enable All functionality
Test Case 4:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session Remove functionality
Test Case 5:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session Edit Preference functionality
Test Case 6:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session enablement is supported for Market Maker user role
Test Case 7:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session enablement is supported for Broker user role
Test Case 8:To verify that FLEX_MAIN session enablement is supported for HelpDesk user role
